title.narrative: By 2024, the most vulnerable and excluded groups have improved quality of life with rights-based, gender sensitive ,inclusive, equitable access and utilization of essential social services in an environment free of discrimination and violence including in

description.narrative: The root causes of civil war remain unaddressed. Despite the gains made in maintaining national peace and security, the root causes of the country’s 14-year civil war, remained unaddressed. The triggers of conflict include a) an unfinished business of peace and reconciliation and a slow national reconciliation process.
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
